DOC.brief_title: AP-011 Study Evaluate Safety Single Intra-articular Injection Ampion™ Arthritis Basal Thumb Joint
DOC.detailed_description: A prospective phase I study evaluate safety single intra-articular injection Ampion™ treatment arthritis basal thumb joint . Primary Objective : To evaluate safety Ampion™ ( 3 mL ) comparison saline placebo ( 3 mL ) inject basal thumb joint .
